title: The Worship of His Church
speaker: recWqrT2BgmANa1Sl
speaker_bio: David Bousquet has served as the Pastor of the Cranesville Bible Church for more than ten years. He is the author of "Simply Put", and "He is Exalted".
series_description: Through this series of messages, we will explore what God has intended His church to be and look like.  We will explore topics of worship, giving, structure, leadership, purpose, and future.

title: For All Eternity
body_content: Eternity is going to be wonderful, as we will spend it upon the New Earth in a state similar to that which Adam enjoyed.  It is definitely not what we would imagine, for it is so much better.
speaker: recWqrT2BgmANa1Sl

series_description: This is a catch all for sermons who have no series.

title: The God Who Provides
speaker: recWqrT2BgmANa1Sl
speaker_bio: David Bousquet has served as the Pastor of the Cranesville Bible Church for more than ten years. He is the author of "Simply Put", and "He is Exalted".
series_description: The Wilderness are those time periods of the Christian's life which are filled with trial, temptation, weakness, and frailty.  As a result each believer is able to learn precious truths about God and himself while journeying through the wilderness.
